joke: I hate Russian dolls <break time="1s"/> They're so full of themselves.
What do you give to a sick lemon? <break time="1s"/> Lemon aid!
Today I gave my dead batteries away. They were free of charge.
My favorite word is "drool." It just rolls off the tongue.
Why didn't the astronaut come home to his wife? <break time="1s"/> He needed his space.
